projects.title: Crime Registering Chatbot
projects.summary: Provides the environment of chatting based Crime Registration for victims remotely and instantly. This system gives a real time crime reporting experience. After the victims answers the questions of chatbot, the officer will get a auto-generated report and then take suitable action.
projects.description: This system gives a real time crime reporting experience and does not require victim to go to physically visit police station for filing a report. This was a group project which was developed during Smart India Hackathon(SIH)-2020. It was a 5 member team and project was build by great coordination among team members
features: OTP verification for registering users
End to End Data Encryption for Crime Registeration
NLP (Natural Language Processing) implemented for processing user responses and validation purpose
Decision tree for questioning
Validation for user responses
Stores the IP address and Some Information about device
Machine Learning implemented (Chabot can be trained by adding new dataset of crime, no explicit programming needed)
Current Crime Datasets: Ransomware, Phishing, Theft, (more data can be added and bot will learn it automatically)

projects.title: Full stack E-commerce store
projects.summary: This a complete full stack eCommerce store made with MERN stack. The store has funtionalities for buying products, payment gateway, user-authentication, product search and rating and admin functions to manage the store
projects.description: The store has funtionalities for buying products, payment gateway, user-authentication, product search and rating and admin functions to manage the store
features: Functionality for customers to view products, add to cart, review products, buy products, search products etc.
Implemented admin dashboard functions like mangaging customer orders, change stock of products, add new products, edit products, manage users etc
User authentication and authorization using JSON web-tokens (JWT)
Application state management using redux
Payment gateway implemented using PayPal

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.summary: This is Task management android app which allows users to add their pending tasks/todos and keep a note of them to increase their productivity. The app has complete user-authentication for signup/signin along with email verfication.
projects.description: The App was made as a mini project for learning android programming. The App uses backend and database provided by firebase.
features: Complete User Authentication
Email verfication upon sign-up for verifying identity of user
Facility for changing account password/Forgot Passowrd to users
Allows user to add their pending and upcoming tasks/todos
Users can remove/delete the tasks after completion
Reminder to users through Alarm and Notifcations before the due data

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.summary: This project is my personal portfolio which gives tell gives information about my skills and projects. This protfolio is made using React and material-ui for styling.
features: Made using Modern React with React-Hooks
UI designed and styled using Material-UI
All the Portfolio data flows from a single JSON file to respectives sections which makes updating and modfying any data on the portfolio a lot easier.
Portfolio has full Mobile responsive design

projects.title: Voice Powered Expense Tracker
projects.summary: This is a expense tracker web app which can also be installed as a Progressive Web App (PWA). In this user users can add all trasactions and app the app with summarize and visualize all transaction with help of charts
projects.description: The app also has a voice functionality thourght which the app will automatically pickup the required transaction details from the user's speech. The voice recognization is powered by https://www.speechly.com/ .
features: The App also has voice functionality and can detect the transactions details like amount, date, type of transaction automatically from user-speech.
App analyzes the transactions and also convert it in form of charts for visual overview.
App also has localstorage implemented to store the all previous transactions in browser.

projects.title: Mail4U
projects.summary: A Short Messaging Application. This a Java Desktop application made using SQL Database. It has Sign In & Sign Up functionality for users and View all send & received email. Email can be sent through unique username.
projects.description: This was a group project of 3 members made for mini-project for college submission in 3rd semester.
features: User Sign-in and Sign-up using SQL
Users can send messages/Email to each through username which is unique for every user
View messages/Delete messages
It is a Desktop Application and can run on Mac/Windows through JVM
